short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play and pause Crave using your spacebar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spacebar: the universal key for playing and pausing. Except on Canadian streaming platform Crave.ca ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

This extension lets you play/pause things you're watching on Crave using your spacebar, thereby profoundly improving your life.

If there are other things that annoy you about Crave, tell me about them and I'll see if I can fix them.

This extension is not affiliated with Crave or Bell Media.
